title: "Error Connecting To Game Please Check Connection" (Trust me, it's more than my ethernet cable)
body: Okay so I have been having this issue on and off and on and off and I'm just now posting this because I got a low priority queue... Yaaaay.... Anyways. Occasionally I will boot up the game, get to the slate screen and suddenly, I get the error message. It boots me back, I re-connect, same issue. I try disconnecting/reconnecting to my wifi, still fails. Finally my team remakes and I can chat in the post-game lobby (Also the pantheon was being a douche about it because he was salty {{champion:80}} {{item:3070}} ) Anyways. Ideas?

replies.body: Your connection seems to be blocked or having some issue from reaching the game server.  The post game lobby is pvp.net, a different server than where you're seeing the error.  Run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  Test it out in a custom game, and me know the results!
Well it seems to have fixed itself as between the time of you posting this, it allowed me to play a match of the new game mode. Now time to grind out those last Leaver Buster games.{{item:3070}}
